code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./Post.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Post=_ref=>{let{postId}=_ref;const[data,setData]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetcher=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/api/post/'+postId);const data=await response.json();setData(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);}};fetcher();},[postId]);if(data===null)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Loading..."});else return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"post-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:data.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["by ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:'/user/'+data.user_id,children:data.username})," on ",new Date(data.creation_time).toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:data.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u2764\uFE0F ",data.likes]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"comment-section",children:data.comments.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uB313\uAE00\uC774 \uC5C6\uC2B5\uB2C8\uB2E4."})}):data.comments.map(comment=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"comment",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:'/user/'+comment.user_id,children:comment.username})," on ",new Date(comment.creation_time).toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:comment.content})]}))})]});};export default Post;
